measured_by: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale (CESD-R-10)

The same table lists the “Interaction Anxiousness Scale (IAS-3),” evidencing that social interaction anxiety was measured with this scale.
Table 4 includes the “Positive and Negative Affect Schedule” in the Mental health section, indicating affect was captured with the PANAS measure.
The questionnaire list identifies the “UCLA Loneliness Scale (ULS-4),” demonstrating that perceived loneliness was assessed via this instrument.
In the Emotion regulation category, Table 4 names the “Emotion Regulation Questionnaire,” showing that habitual use of specific regulation strategies was measured with this scale.
